game.name: Scarecrow
game.shortDescription: Scarecrow is a hellish mix of adventure and adrenaline-pumping top-down shooter. Plunge into the chaos of gangster Russia of the 90s and uncover the secrets of your dark past.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Scarecrow is a hellish mix of adventure and adrenaline-pumping top-down shooter. Plunge into the chaos of gangster Russia of the 90s and uncover the secrets of your dark past.
